attributes.action: To make all MPs who have claimed expenses for personal gain to pay the money back.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My faith in many politicians has been shaken by the revelation that certain MPs are using the ill-managed expenses system to defraud the public and obtain easy money.  Prime Minister, please tell me what the difference is between this practice and benefit fraud.  It is unacceptable and deplorable.
I am particularly disappointed by Shalid Malik and other MPs like him who shamelessly show no remorse for their brazen dishonesty.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
